local_intent: Detect the T-block, approach and align to it with coarse tolerance, then verify proximity/alignment.
assumptions: T-block is visible and reachable; verification via IsAt suffices before yaw setting and pushing.
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of GLOBAL_BT: detection with retry, ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.01, 1500 ms), then verification. Subsequent yaw and push steps are handled upstream.
